media.headline: Nunez's backhanded play
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Nunez makes nice backhanded play for the out
media.bigblurb: Paul Goldschmidt hits a hard grounder down the third-base line that is fielded nicely by Eduardo Nunez, who fires to first for the out

media.headline: Hernandez's two-run single
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Hernandez singles to drive in two runs
media.bigblurb: Gorkys Hernandez flares a single to right field to score Eduardo Nunez and Joe Panik, giving the Giants a 2-0 lead in the top of the 2nd

media.headline: Peralta makes nice sliding catch
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Peralta slides to make a nice catch in right
media.bigblurb: David Peralta ranges to his left and slides to make a great catch in right field on a hit by Hunter Pence for the out, ending the frame

media.headline: Panik's great diving stop
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Panik dives, throws to first to get out
media.bigblurb: Joe Panik makes a great diving stop on a hard hit grounder up the middle by Chris Owings, then fires to first to get the out

media.headline: Marrero gives Giants 3-0 edge
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Marrero flies out to right to score Crawford
media.bigblurb: Chris Marrero hits a sacrifice fly ball to right field to score Brandon Crawford, giving the Giants an 3-0 lead in the 3rd inning

media.headline: Goldschmidt jacks solo homer
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Goldschmidt hits first homer of the season
media.bigblurb: Paul Goldschmidt drills his first home run of the season off Johnny Cueto in the bottom of 4th, getting the D-backs on the board

media.headline: Owings' RBI single
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Owings singles to left to cut into deficit
media.bigblurb: Chris Owings hits a single to shallow left field to score Jake Lamb, giving the D-backs their second run of the inning

media.headline: Crawford's solo homer
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Crawford drills a solo homer to deep right
media.bigblurb: Brandon Crawford drills a solo home run to deep right field that sneaks by the right-field foul pole, giving the Giants a 4-2 lead

media.headline: Lamb snags a liner from Posey
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Lamb snags a liner from Posey to end frame
media.bigblurb: With two runners on in the 4th inning, Jake Lamb makes a great snag on a hard liner from Buster Posey to end the frame and get out of a jam

media.headline: Hernandez's two-run double
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Hernandez knocks in two more runs with double
media.bigblurb: Gorkys Hernandez hits a double down the left-field line to score Joe Panik and Johnny Cueto, giving the Giants a commanding 7-2 lead

media.headline: Belt's RBI double
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Belt smacks double to right to bring in run
media.bigblurb: Brandon Belt drives a line-drive double to left field to score Gorkys Hernandez, extending the Giants' lead to 8-2 in the 5th

media.headline: Lamb's two-run blast
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Lamb hits a two-run homer to right-center
media.bigblurb: Jake Lamb drills a two-run home run that lands in the swimming pool in right-center field, his first homer of the season

media.headline: Bradley fans seven over 3 1/3
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bradley fans seven over 3 1/3 innings
media.bigblurb: Archie Bradley strikes out seven over 3 1/3 innings of relief, allowing just three hits and a walk vs. the Giants

media.headline: Corbin fans Marrero
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Corbin strikes Marrero out looking
media.bigblurb: Patrick Corbin strikes out Chris Marrero looking in the top of the 2nd for his first punchout of the game

media.headline: Cueto drives in a run
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Cueto knocks in a run, reaches on error
media.bigblurb: Johnny Cueto hits a grounder up the middle that is misplayed by Chris Owings to knock in Eduardo Nunez, then Cueto reaches on the error

media.headline: Cueto connects on single
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Cueto chops single to right field off Corbin
media.bigblurb: Johnny Cueto chops a grounder down the first-base line past a diving Paul Goldschmidt and into right field, tallying a single

media.headline: Hernandez's four-RBI game
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Hernandez drives in four runs in Giants' win
media.bigblurb: Gorkys Hernandez tallies four RBIs vs. the D-backs, going 2-for-5 with a two-run single in the 2nd and a two-run double in the 5th

media.headline: Moth gets in Posey's facemask
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Moth comes right at Posey's face during game
media.bigblurb: Buster Posey has a run-in with a moth as it attacks his facemask while he is catching against the D-backs

media.headline: Cueto fans Tomas to end the 5th
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Cueto strikes out Tomas to end the 5th
media.bigblurb: Johnny Cueto fans Yasmany Tomas swinging to end the 5th inning, one of his five strikeouts over five innings in his win over the D-backs

media.headline: Lovullo reflects on loss
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Lovullo talks what went wrong in loss
media.bigblurb: Manager Torey Lovullo discusses a tough start for Patrick Corbin and mistakes by the team that ultimately led to the loss against the Giants

media.headline: Recap: SF 8, ARI 4
media.blurb: 4/4/17: Hernandez's four RBIs lead Giants to 8-4 win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Gorkys Hernandez drove in four and Johnny Cueto recorded an RBI along with the win as the Giants won 8-4

media.headline: 4/4/17 CG: SF@ARI
media.blurb: 4/4/17 Condensed Game: SF@ARI
media.bigblurb: 4/4/17 Condensed Game: SF@ARI

media.headline: Bochy on bounceback win
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bochy on Cueto's contributions in 8-4 win
media.bigblurb: Manager Bruce Bochy discusses Johnny Cueto's performance at the plate, on the mound and on the basepaths in Giants' 8-4 win over the D-backs
